post.summary: Create one or more events. Requires public API key in Bearer token.

201.description: The events have been successfully created.

get.summary: Get events based on a query. Requires private API key in Bearer token.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event name to filter by.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user ID to filter by.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: The group ID to filter by.

parameters.name: anonymousId
parameters.description: The anonymous ID to filter by.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID to filter by.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date to filter by.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date to filter by.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit of records to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of records to return.

200.description: The events have been successfully retrieved.

post.summary: Execute queries via SQL. Requires private API key in Bearer token.

200.description: The queries have been successfully executed.
The workspace has been successfully created. Requires private API key in Bearer token.
The workspace has been successfully updated. Requires private API key in Bearer token.
The workspace has been successfully retrieved.
The webhooks have been successfully retrieved. Requires private API key in Bearer token.
The webhook has been successfully created. Requires private API key in Bearer token.
The webhook has been successfully deleted. Requires private API key in Bearer token.

anonymousId.description: The anonymous ID of the user. See [anonymousId](https://segment.com/docs/connections/spec/common/#anonymousid).

event.description: The event name. Used only with `type: "track"`.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the event. Autogenerated if not provided.

type.description: The type of the event. Possible values: `page`, `track`, `identify`, `group`.

properties.description: The properties of the event. Only used with `type: "track"`.

traits.description: The traits of the user or group.

instanceId.description: Optional instance ID. Instance IDs are used to partition events by source. It is typically used for isolating data for the same customer. For instance, if you have a SaaS product, you may want to segment events by customer. In this case, you can set the instance ID to the customer's organizaiton ID.

anonymousId.description: The anonymous ID of the user. See [anonymousId](https://segment.com/docs/connections/spec/common/#anonymousid).

properties.description: The properties of the event. Only used with `type: "track"`.

instanceId.description: Optional instance ID. Instance IDs are used to partition events by source. It is typically used for isolating data for the same customer. For instance, if you have a SaaS product, you may want to segment events by customer. In this case, you can set the instance ID to the customer's organizaiton ID.

total.description: The total number of results. If `null`, the total is unknown.

results.description: The events found based on the query.

example: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM events WHERE event = "UserSignedUp"

total.description: The total number of results. If `null`, the total is unknown.

results.description: The results of the queries, returned in the same order as the queries.

name.description: The name of the workspace to be created.

databaseName.description: The name of the database associated with the workspace.

isDefault.description: Indicates if the new workspace should be set as default. Defaults to `false`.

workspaceId.description: The unique identifier of the workspace.

isDefault.description: Indicates if this is the default workspace.

databaseName.description: The name of the database associated with the workspace.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the workspace was created.

uuid.description: The UUID of the webhook. Automatically generated.

url.description: The URL that the webhook will send events to.

enableBatching.description: Whether to enable batching for the webhook.

createdAt.description: The date and time the webhook was created.

eventTypes.description: The event types that the webhook will send. Use `*` to match all event types.

eventNames.description: The event names that the webhook will send. Use `*` to match all event names.

total.description: The total number of results. If `null`, the total is unknown.

url.description: The URL that the webhook will send events to.

enableBatching.description: Whether to enable batching for the webhook. Defaults to `false`.

eventTypes.description: The event types that the webhook will send. Defaults to `["*"] (all event types)`.

eventNames.description: The event names that the webhook will send. Defaults to `["*"] (all event names)`.
